Package interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.control

Class SubWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.control.SubWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiagramWindow, DialogWindow

    public abstract class SubWindow
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandHandler
    A class of subwindows for displaying diagram views. The subwindows can be closed, resized and moved. Cycling between available diagram views is possible too.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getFrame

        public Rectangle getFrame​()
        Returns the frame of this subwindow.

      • getBorderedFrame

        public Rectangle getBorderedFrame​()
        Returns the frame of this subwindow, including its resize borders.
        Returns:
        The frame of this subwindow with a margin of 5 for each resize border.

      • resize

        public void resize​(int fromX,
                   int fromY,
                   int toX,
                   int toY)
            throws InvalidResizeWindowException
        Resize this subwindow from the given start coordinate to the given end coordinate.
        Parameters:
        fromX - The start x coordinate for the resize.
        fromY - The start y coordinate for the resize.
        toX - The end x coordinate for the resize.
        toY - The end y coordinate for the resize.
        Throws:
        InvalidResizeWindowException - The resize was not successful.

      • move

        public void move​(int fromX,
                 int fromY,
                 int toX,
                 int toY)
          throws InvalidMoveWindowException
        Moves the this subwindow horizontally and/or vertically.
        Parameters:
        fromX - The start x coordinate for the move.
        fromY - The start y coordinate for the move.
        toX - The end x coordinate for the move.
        toY - The end y coordinate for the move.
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveWindowException

      • display

        public void display​(PaintBoard paintBoard)
        Display the currently active view in the given paintboard.
        Parameters:
        paintBoard - The paintboard on which should be drawn.

      • closeButtonEncloses

        public boolean closeButtonEncloses​(int x,
                                   int y)
        Returns whether or not the given coordinates lie within this subwindow's close button.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate to check with.
        y - The y coordinate to check with.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given coordinates lie within this subwindow's close button.
